headline.main: MOISE RESIGNS POST WITH SCRAP AGENCY; Quits as Head of War Materials at Request of RFC

lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH, Feb. 28 -- B.C. Moise announced his resignation today as president of War Materials, Inc., the government agency organized seven months ago to salvage scrap for the war.
abstract: B C Moise resigns on request as War Materials Inc pres following criticism of WPB
snippet: PITTSBURGH, Feb. 28 -- B.C. Moise announced his resignation today as president of War Materials, Inc., the government agency organized seven months ago to salvage scrap for the war....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
